thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasantly Surprised
thread.title_full: Pleasantly Surprised - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PAGD52
title: Pleasantly Surprised
text:
I LOVED staying here. The rooms are amazing, clean and comfortable. Great price, as well. The staff is very friendly and helpful. There are plenty of eateries, shops and bars/pubs around the area. There is also a metro stop, plenty of taxis and buses to hop on. There are many tourist sites within walking distance.
The only downside: the elevator broke down a few times and it was a bit scary.
